ADAPTIVE.NAME: Adaptive
ADAPTIVE.DESC: Whenever the Ambience phase changes, apply [STACKS] Poise to all of [OWNER]'s arguments.

AMBIENT_SHIFT_DIALOGUE.NAME: Ambient Shift: Dialogue
AMBIENT_SHIFT_DIALOGUE.DESC:
When this has 5+ stacks, shift Ambience one level towards Guarded, then destroy this.

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, remove 1 stack from this argument.

AMBIENT_SHIFT_AGGRESSION.NAME: Ambient Shift: Aggression
AMBIENT_SHIFT_AGGRESSION.DESC:
When this has 5+ stacks, shift Ambience one level towards Dangerous, then destroy this.

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, remove 1 stack from this argument.

CHATTERBOX.NAME: Chatterbox
CHATTERBOX.DESC: [OWNER]'s "Rapid Fire" cards attack [STACKS] additional time(s) until end of turn.

CORE_AI.NAME: Combative
CORE_AI.DESC: Whenever one of [OWNER]'s arguments is destroyed, deal [STACKS] damage to a random enemy argument.

CORE_CEASELESS.NAME: Ceaseless
CORE_CEASELESS.DESC: Whenever one of [OWNER]'s non-core arguments is destroyed, Deploy it with [STACKS] stack(s).

CORE_DECKARD.NAME: Collected
CORE_DECKARD.DESC: At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, apply [STACKS] Poise to this argument.

CORE_DESOLATION.NAME: Desolation
CORE_DESOLATION.DESC:
At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, if the Ambience phase is in Desolation, deal [STACKS] damage to ALL of [ENEMY]'s arguments.

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, change the Ambience phase to Desolation.

While Ambience is in Desolation, this argument is Untouchable.

CORE_PICKPOCKET.NAME: Pickpocket
CORE_PICKPOCKET.DESC: At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, steal [STACKS*15] Gold from [ENEMY] and Deploy [STACKS*15] Sticky Fingers.

CORE_VOLATILE.NAME: Volatile
CORE_VOLATILE.DESC: When this argument is attacked, deal [STACKS] damage to a random enemy argument.

CORE_HARDENED_RESOLVE.NAME: Hardened Resolve
CORE_HARDENED_RESOLVE.DESC: When this argument takes unblocked damage, apply [STACKS] Poise to this argument, then add 1 stack to this argument. Reset this argument's stacks to 1 at the start of [OWNER]'s turn.

TALISMAN_RESOLVE.NAME: Talisman of Renewal
TALISMAN_RESOLVE.DESC:
At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, increase a random non-core friendly argument's resolve by [STACKS].

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, if this argument has 4+ stacks, create a copy of this argument and halve both arguments' stacks.

TALISMAN_EXPULSE.NAME: Talisman of Expulsion
TALISMAN_EXPULSE.DESC:
At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, deal [STACKS] damage to all enemy arguments.

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, if this argument has 4+ stacks, create a copy of this argument and halve both arguments' stacks.

TALISMAN_PURIFICATION.NAME: Talisman of Purification
TALISMAN_PURIFICATION.DESC:
At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, deal [STACKS] damage to a random enemy argument.

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, if this argument has 4+ stacks, create a copy of this argument and halve both arguments' stacks.

STICKY_FINGERS.NAME: Sticky Fingers
STICKY_FINGERS.DESC: When destroyed, return [STACKS] Gold to [ENEMY]. At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, halve this argument's stacks.

AUTHORITY.NAME: Authority
AUTHORITY.DESC:
Draw +1 card at the end of your turn.

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn or whenever this argument gains Poise, deal [STACKS] damage to a random enemy argument.

FINESSE.NAME: Finesse
FINESSE.DESC: The next [STACKS] Dialogue attack(s) that [OWNER] plays also draw 1 card.

HEATED.NAME: Heated
HEATED.DESC: [OWNER]'s Aggression attacks deal +[STACKS] damage. Remove 1 stack from this argument at the end of [OWNER]'s turn.

HOTHEADED.NAME: Hotheaded
HOTHEADED.DESC: Whenever the Ambience phase changes towards Dangerous, [OWNER] draws [STACKS] card(s).

PARADOX.NAME: Paradox
PARADOX.DESC:
When destroyed, deal [STACKS] damage to [OWNER]'s core argument.

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, add [STACKS] stack(s) to this argument.

BULLDOZE.NAME: Bulldoze
BULLDOZE.DESC: Whenever one of [ENEMY]'s arguments is destroyed, [OWNER] gains [STACKS] action(s) and draws [STACKS] card(s).

SIMMER.NAME: Simmer
SIMMER.DESC:
When destroyed, deal [STACKS] damage to a random enemy argument.

This argument gains 1 stack whenever Poise is applied to any of [OWNER]'s arguments.

At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, destroy this.

STAY_COOL.NAME: Stay Cool
STAY_COOL.DESC: At the start of [OWNER]'s turn, apply [STACKS] Poise to [OWNER]'s core argument.

STRAWMAN.NAME: Strawman
STRAWMAN.DESC:
This must be destroyed before targeting [OWNER]'s other arguments.

This has max resolve equal to stack count (currently [STACKS]).

MAGNETIC_PERSONALITY.NAME: Magnetic Personality
MAGNETIC_PERSONALITY.DESC: Whenever the Ambience level changes, Deploy [STACKS] Finesse and [STACKS] Heated.

WORDSMITH.NAME: Wordsmith
WORDSMITH.DESC: [OWNER]'s Dialogue and Aggression cards gain Influential [STACKS]. At the end of [OWNER]'s turn, destroy this.
